imagePrompt: A wide, heartwarming shot in the distinctive claymation art style, depicting a vibrant community ritual. Multiple diverse clay figures representing people of all ages are gathered in an open courtyard, united under the soft glow of a majestic, benevolent full clay moon in a serene night sky. They are engaged in acts of reverence: some are placing offerings on beautifully sculpted clay altars, others are bowing in prayer, and wisps of incense smoke curl gracefully upwards from traditional clay incense burners. Warm, glowing clay lanterns and candles illuminate the scene, casting a comforting light on the gathered families. The composition is balanced, showing a harmonious gathering, with leading lines from the courtyard paving and architecture drawing the eye towards the central ritual. The atmosphere is peaceful, traditional, communal, and filled with a sense of enduring hope and togetherness, symbolizing the spirit of the Mid-Autumn Festival.
